hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: On second thought, let's not go to Hyrule Castle. 'Tis a silly place.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #0# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #the Ice Arrows#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Zora Mask#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Zora Mask#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Bunny Hood#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple GS Song of Time Room

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: Remember that time you did that really embarrassing thing?^${12 68 3A}Yikes.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Zora Tunic# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #a Deku Stick# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Zora's River#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Zora Shop#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #1# major item.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #3 Deku Scrubs#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern GS Vines Above Stairs

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #the Lens of Truth# and #the Skull Mask#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a #grave with a free chest#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #crater's melody# is #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Wallet# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.
